```py
In [1]: s = pd.Series([1, 2, 3, 4])

In [2]: mask = pd.array([True, True, False, None], dtype="boolean")

In [3]: s
Out[3]: 
0    1
1    2
2    3
3    4
dtype: int64

In [4]: mask
Out[4]: 
<BooleanArray>
[True, True, False, <NA>]
Length: 4, dtype: boolean 
```

```py
>>> s[mask]
Traceback (most recent call last):
...
ValueError: cannot mask with array containing NA / NaN values
